body.name: Novilla Full Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Mattress with Gel Memory Foam & Pocketed Coil for Pressure Relief & Motion Isolation, Medium Firm Full Bed Mattress in a Box, Amenity
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 41 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: LASTING COMFORT FOR A RESTFUL NIGHT'S SLEEP: Novilla full mattress combines comfort and support . The memory foam in our hybrid mattress provides pressure relief to keep you comfortable through the night. The high-quality pocketed coils form a stable support system that gives you the best support your body needs. Relax your spine, hips, shoulders, and lower back for any sleep position with our full size mattress.

DISTURBANCE-FREE SLEEP WITH STABLE SUPPORT : Memory foam mattress with resilient pocket coils to reduce motion transfer. Prevents you from being easily woken up by your partner when they move. Sleeping on a full foam mattress gives strong support and firmness without that sinking feel. The full bed mattress features reinforced edge support, so you won't fall off when sitting or sleeping on the edge of the mattress.

ENJOY BETTER QUALITY SLEEP AND STAY COZY : Full bed mattress cover is made of skin-friendly fabric with a soft touch sensation. Cooling gel layer with individual pocket springs promote airflow and transfer more body heat away, to maintain a comfortable sleep temperature, so you won't overheat at night. While the pillow-top mattress layer fits your body curves, provides extra softness and comfort.

HEALTHY SLEEP STARTS WITH NOVILLA FULL MATTRESSES: Memory foam is CertiPUR-US certified and does not release any harmful odor, ensuring a safe sleeping environment for your whole night. The mattress is vacuum-compressed and packed into a box, making it easy to move and install. Just wait 72 hours for the full hybrid mattress to expand to its original size.

SATISFIED PURCHASE & NO RISK: Novilla 12 inch full size mattress is long-lasting and durable. You can enjoy a 10-year warranty and 100-day free sleep trial. Full memory foam mattress fits all types of beds except for adjustable frames. If you need help or have any inquiries related to our products, please feel free to contact us anytime.
body.description: Novilla hybrid mattresses give you just the right feel of comfort. Bringing you a good shopping experience is what we strive for. Let's look at the mattress features together to see why this mattress is the right choice for getting a good night's sleep. Long-Lasting & Stable Support System - no need to worry about that sinking feeling when you fall asleep even if you have a heavy body type. Edge Support - the edge of the thickened springs helps to increase bounce and support. Whether you are sleeping on your side or sitting at the edge of the bed, you will not slip off.Restful & Silent Sleep - Memory foam conforms to the contours of your body and provides pressure relief so you can sleep comfortably all night long. Pocket-coils make no noise when you toss and turn, allowing for a more restful sleep.3 Steps Set Up - It only takes 3 steps to enjoy the ultimate comfort sleep with the novilla coil mattress (unpack the box, drag out the mattress, and open the vacuum package). Then all that's left is to wait 72 hours for the mattress to expand to its original size.Shipping Dimensions: 12 Inch Full: 13*13*59; Approx. 78lbsWhat you get with your purchase： A mattress A manual An openerNote: After taking out the mattress from the box, you can use the included opener to unpack the mattress from the vacuum. Be careful and be at a safe distance the moment the mattress pops open. Please wait for at least 72 hours for it to expand to its original height to ensure a comfortable sleeping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breathable Fabric & Pillow-Top Mattress The mattress cover is made of skin-friendly fabric to give you a soft and smooth feel. And the Pillow-top brings you a cushion to relieve pressure. Sleep more peace of mind at night. Superior Edge Support The outer side of the mattress uses thickened springs to strengthen the support, and will not slip when sleeping on the side of the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mat Rest!
reviews.reviewText: What a great selection for replacement of our traditional mattress and box springs. Excellent quality and comfort. This was an effortless install on our new queen frame, perfect fit. It unrolled and expanded completely in less time than expected. The construction makes it firm yet especially comfortable for a relaxed good night sleep and waking up refreshed. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a new non traditional mattress at an exceptional price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Buying a mattress online is a nerve racking experience. I must of looked at 15 different mattresses before deciding to buy this Novilla. I ordered the mattress on the 3rd and UPS delivered it on the 5th. In the tracking info it said it weighed 88lbs, but this definitely felt like it was over 100lbs. I had a Serta mattress before this and this mattress felt much heavier!Novilla included a manual and a tool to open the vacuum sealed plastic without running the risk of cutting the mattress itself. As soon as the plastic was pierced it started to make a hissing noise. Once I cut it open all the way the mattress just popped completely open. It did open upside down though so just be mindful. Also, be careful because it can unfold quick.Once open it expanded to full size. The photo below of the mattress opened was taken 10 minutes after removing it from the plastic! My wife and I left it for 4 hours without laying on it, but I don’t think it needed any more then 30 minutes!*As of right now, it’s 9:10PM on the 7th so tonight will be the 3rd night we sleep on it. It’s make no noise, it’s more on the firm side for us, and it feel so much better then the Serta we had!! My wife is about 120lbs and I’m around 195lbs. I know depending on your weight it might feel softer or firmer.I hope this review helps someone who is considering this mattress! If I didn’t already know and had to guess the price, I’d say it’s in the range of $800-$1200. So if you’re thinking about making the purchase and you like a slightly firmer mattress that’s quiet and really comfortable, look no further!I’ll be sure to update this review in the next 2-4 weeks to let y’all know how it’s going.**1 week update 08/12/23I know it’s only been a week, so I don’t have too much to say. It’s holding up great and still feels the same as the day we received it. It has no noise issues, no sinking issues, it’s still very comfortable! The only con I can say about it is it’s just a tiny bit larger then a traditional queen mattress. Each side hangs off the frame by about 1 inch. That’s just me nitpicking though because it’s not a problem whatsoever. Anywho, I hope this review helps someone with their purchase, I’ll check back in at the 1 month mark.***2 months & 2 weeks later! 10/19/232 months with the new mattress and it’s still like brand new! No sinking or anything. I wouldn’t guess this mattress was so cheap if I didn’t already know. 3rd photo posted is from the 2 month mark.**it’s now October 19th and still, the mattress feels brand new! I’ve been rotating it every 2 weeks when the sheets get washed. It’s more broken in now so it might of just gotten a tad softer, but not in a bad way. even a $3,000 mattress will break in after a bit of use. There’s no sagging or anything! It still looks brand new when the the sheets and mattress protector are off of it. I recommend this bed to everyone! Someone on Reddit bought it with my recommendation and I heard from him twice now about how good it’s been for him. So yeah, I’ll continue to check back in, I’m glad my review has helped so many people!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for Great price
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these for my Kids the price for both wasn't bad especially for the price as well there Very comfortable and thick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I have several different brands of mattress and I can say this is one of the best. However, it's already sagging after two weeks sleeping on it (I weight 125lb)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What we were looking for!
reviews.reviewText: My partner and i had an old mattress that was over a decade old, so naturally we needed a new one. Unfortunately, money has been tight and looking for a mattress in a store around $1k was not an option.Found this little gem and decided to take a leap, and lo and behold! Easy to open (though i almost hit myself in the face from opening it upside down), grew to its expected size in about 2.5 days, and lost that weird "new" smell easily. Good support for our chronic aches, sturdy, and a good balance between firm and soft for us!Like some other reviewers have said, the edge support is a little weak, but nothing thats a deal breaker. No squeaking or noise when we get in and out of bed.To some, its probably not terribly groundbreaking, but for us, its just right!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mattress after comparing it with many other mattresses that had excellent reviews online. What made me get it was that it seemed to be of slightly better quality than the leading competitors. I can agree it definitely does sleep cooler. My son has stopped complaining about it being too hot in the bed. As for the comfort of the bed, my son does feel like rest better than on his previous mattress. The mattress for my 6 year old som and I have to say I was not expecting the quality and comfort that came for the price. The mattress is air sealed and rolled and once you open it it expands, which was fun for our toddler to watch. It has been hard getting our little one to sleep in her room, but a couple nights on this mattress and he loves sleeping in his room now. One of the best purchases I have made in a long time. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So this bed is comfortable, just thought it was going to be a bit firmer than what I received. I won’t deny that I do sleep good and overall it’s well worth the value. Just wish it was a bit firmer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I had been wanting a new mattress for our pedastool bed, but mattresses can be very pricey. I studied them all and read hundreds of reviews. I was even considering one in this same brand when I came across this model. It's a hybrid. It has coils that are wrapped in the bottom, a large thick memory foam mattress in the middle and a jell layer on top that gives you a pillow top feel without being too soft. It's designed for side sleepers. It has a slightly raised lip on the sides of the bed to ensure you don't roll off. It's also made to adjust to your pressure points as you sleep. I'm disabled and spend a lot of time in bed. I love it. When I read that it has a 100 day sleep trial and a 10 year warranty I was sold. Great mattress at a great price. The delivery guy had a hard time getting the product onto my porch. My grand kids found the warranty out in the yard. I called customer service and they refunded me my first payment which was great on their part. Nothing but good things to say about this mattress and seller. Hope this helps. You can't go wrong with a 100 day free trial no questions asked. Very much worth the money for a great night's sleep. I can honestly say this was my best pick. I did My research and kept going back to this one. I'd buy it again and again. My husband even loves it.
